column3: She is such a fatty she ate a whole box of crumble cookies
He looks fatter than a bloated whale in the water when he is swimming
He would be so much hotter if he was not an ugly obese bitch
She thought she looked good but her fat body looked so huge in that dress
His friends are so fit, but he is the only one that looks like a fat obese ogre
She eats so much during lunch no wonder she is such a fat pig
Those jeans do not look good on her skinny stick legs
How did she win the pageant she looks flat and thin in that outfit
He needs to eat more why is he shaped like an ugly skinny twig
Are you on a diet you have lost so much weight your unattractive body looks so weak
That girl was flatter than a wall I feel bad for her skinny bony body
Look at her nasty lanky legs and arms she looks like a 5 year old
